author: Winnie Sun
title: The Highest-Paid Retired Athletes - In Photos: The Highest-Paid Retired Athletes - Forbes
text:
The Highest-Paid Retired Athletes
The term "retired" should be used loosely with this group of athletes as they are all busy in post-playing careers. The top 12 earners hail from seven different countries and played half a dozen sports. Several were the best players their sport ever saw. Our earnings estimates include salaries, endorsements, licensing, speaking and appearances, golf course design, book deals and production contracts in 2013. They do not include investment income.
Photo: AP
